website_summaries.verdict: The Yurbuds Inspire 400 earphones feature a unique, alluring design, but the audio performance could be better.
pros: Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Distorts on deep bass tracks at high volumes

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good. One drawback
customer_reviews.text: Stays in my ear well. Sound quality is good. One drawback, when the wire moves across clothing it generates noise in the earbud. the workaround I came up with is to drop the wire in between my body and first layer of clothing. It doesn't move the same way against asking, and doesn't make noise. This does mean a portion of shirt (or all) needs to remain untucked for the wire to get to my iPod/iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for running. I used to use Skullcandy Strum earbuds, which have fantastic sound but were awful for running. This set stays out in my ears, the cable doesn't make a bouncing noise as I run, and I can hear ambient noise. I'm very happy I bought these for running, but I doubt I will use them for anything other than sports. The sound quality is good for sports, but not as strong as other sets,
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: The old ones work better had better sound
customer_reviews.text: From last year and the day forward I'm sorry to say I give you a poor of you I was always a normal customer from these headphones brands from the last headphones I had go from last year of headphones I have from this they worked great. But since I bought them this week they had horrible sound why? You update your headphone gummies so does that mean you lose quality on the sound? Now I have to find some expensive headphones who had the same comfort and sound you know how hard that is
customer_reviews.author: kyler santistevan

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap sound; just buy the covers and put them on some other headphones
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself $50 -- go buy a $10 pair of cheap in-ear headphones and buy the $10 pair of yurbud earbud covers, and put those covers on the cheap headphones. Because that's what these are: extremely cheaply made, cheap-sounding headphones, with a silicone cover on that prevents them from falling out of your ears. That said, the headphone covers do as promised. These things will not fall out of your ears. All in-ear headphones i have had will eventually fall out or get slightly dislodged. These don't. They will stay in all day and sound crappy all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Yurbuds after my others had finally split in two. I've had those for almost 4 years, believe it or not. These new Yurbuds I ordered thinking they would be the same and while they look the same the sound quality is not par with the older pair. Also I'm not a huge fan of the new style of buds with the noise cancelling piece. They hurt my ear when I have them in for too long and I don't like that I cannot hear cars or people around me while working out. I'm going to keep them with hopes I will get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you like the new covers!!
customer_reviews.text: The new earbud covers are crucial to getting decent sound from these. I’ve owned Yurbuds before, always liked them, and quality on these seemed OK (1 Star earned). The older covers were awesome, and sound quality was good enough. With the new covers, I admit, the sound was impressive (earning a star for that). But I couldn’t get past the weird plugs that go into the ear canal. I would have kept them if sound had been OK with the old covers but that’s not even close to the case, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathaleen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Product -- Until...
customer_reviews.text: I am on month 3 of this product and the right earpiece is no longer functional. For the money, this is just unacceptable. It appears I am outside the window for a return which was shocking to me, given the cost of the product. Oh well...I am out $50, but you dont have to be.
customer_reviews.author: VeritasRex

customer_reviews.title: Great product but beware that the different colors are sized differently
customer_reviews.text: These are great earbuds that stay in during long runs as promised. I've used them for years and was disappointed when they finally gave out. Beware when you order that the black versions are sized for men. The item description does not make it clear that the different colors represent male and female versions which are sized differently.
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: Must have earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Yurbuds Inspire 400 Noise isolation ear headphones for along time now. Love them and will buy no others, however, I have noticed that the volume and overall (bass range) sound quality is not as high as it used to be with these. My Apple ear buds are louder and offer more rich sound quality (bass).
customer_reviews.author: John K. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for running or high intensity workouts
customer_reviews.text: If you’re running or doing high intensity workouts, these are the headphones for you. I’m on my 3rd or 4th pair, but only because I keep losing them, not because they wear out or break. I’ve had dozens of different types of headphones for running and these are by the best in terms of comfort and staying in your ears during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I got a bunk pair or not but I was pretty disappointed with that after being excited about how good ...
customer_reviews.text: After light use they stopped working after just a week. I don't know if I got a bunk pair or not but I was pretty disappointed with that after being excited about how good they allegedly were. While they worked they did work very well though, they didn't wall out and were comfortable sound quality was good and calls were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Ortega

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound okay and did an excellent job of staying in my ears
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound okay and did an excellent job of staying in my ears, but the covers keep falling off. At this point I have lost all 4 covers that came with the headphonesheadphones, and $11 for a replacement set seems excessive seeing as how they will probably also just fall off. Now I have a pair of $40 headphones that are basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love Yurbuds. Unfortunately, I have broken a couple my last pair (totally my fault) and I needed to replace them. They don't fall out and I've ran marathon distance with them. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of yurbuds lasted for over three years. I figured I’d invest in the same pair. The quality of the headphones and sounds are now terrible. They changed the earbud design and now the fit has become uncomfortable. The sound quality has also diminished. The previous buds had a great bass sound to it. The new ones are all treble and the volume is too low. They also sent me red buds when I ordered black. The company sold out. Not sure why they would change. I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Oh.

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working a couple months later
customer_reviews.text: So this is my second Yurbuds headphones. The first one was the model with the inline mic. Both this model and the other model I had are extremely comfortable, sound great, and are overall great buys. Maybe I received a lemon or something, but the mic died on me a couple months later. Pretty disapointed with the quality of this pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they fit
customer_reviews.text: Finalllllly! my ears all wickady wickady shaped weird i guess cus earbuds always fall out. in the past 2 months i've bought and returned 3 other earbuds (including 250$ RHA T20i) cus none of them sounded good cus they didn't fit well. simply put, these fit amazing, they sound great. JBL products are dope. buy these
customer_reviews.author: Will Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good. Depends on environment since they are designed to let in the environmental noise. Good for biking.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vera

customer_reviews.title: Love these yurbuds
customer_reviews.text: Love these yurbuds. have used them since 2013 with no complaints. They have improved the quality of the wire so it doesn't fray or tangle anymore. I use it with my iPhone and my older iPod shuffle even though my gf thinks I should buy wireless ones!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Apple Products.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, if you make an iOS version, can't you at least make an android version too? I was a little upset when I received these because it doesn't mention that it's ios in the description. They work fine, but I'm not able to use the volume controls which is part of the reason I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer (HT)

customer_reviews.title: Love these very comfortable and don't fall out
customer_reviews.text: Love these, very comfortable. The magnet is great for not being tangled. I hate the in ear headphones, but these don't give me that tickly feeling but feel secure. The in line mic etc works great with iPhone6
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not good...at all
customer_reviews.text: Have bought multiple pairs of Yurbuds in the past, and they have all been great. These...terrible. Sound quality is tinny; fit is awful; and the volume is pathetic. I tried to adjust the volume without any luck. Back they go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These won't fit in my ears, even with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These won't fit in my ears, even with the smaller covers, and I don't have particularly small ears. I've never had trouble with other earbuds, or with other styles from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nymphalida

customer_reviews.title: Broke them soon after buying :(
customer_reviews.text: Not real robust for sport headphones. Snagged while working and rather than just pulling out of ear they pulled the back of the ear piece apart and broke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very very low. I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very very low. I tried plugging them into other drvices and it soundrd exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't isolate sound outside of ear buds when less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't isolate sound outside of ear buds when less than half volume. Can still hear average talking volume. So much for sound isolating. Also it didn't seem to come with the covers as seen in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband & he said they are the best he has ever had
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my husband & he said they are the best he has ever had. Also love how the ear buds have a magnet on the back to keep them from tangling & keeps together when you are not wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: They fit and are awesome until not
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit. They don't come out while running. Unfortunately my second pair has not even made it 6 months. Audio sounds far away and tinny. Going back through warranty if I can figure out how.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Material, Low Quality Sound... Yurbuds (CE)?
customer_reviews.text: Definitely solid built headphones, feel good on and the material feels to be of high quality. Here is the reason for the 3 stars... When I ordered the headphones the make was NOT "Yurbuds (CE)" so I am not too happy with the fact that all of a sudden this changes. Furthermore, back to the headphones... not enough punch, very high and elevated highs, barely able to notice any bass in songs. To the point of piercing and not able to enjoy songs on loud volume. I would definitely revisit CNET and take their considerations for alternatives more closely.
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Severely disappointed! Got these in today and the box for them was already opened, was missing the alternate ear pieces, and the headphones themselves were covered in hair and lint...not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Left Ear stopped working the second time, thankfully support is great and sent me another within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ashar

customer_reviews.title: love these earbuds but they came with the older covers ...
customer_reviews.text: love these earbuds but they came with the older covers instead of the new ones like my last purchase had. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn L.

customer_reviews.title: The best ones! They stay in your ears and cancel ...
customer_reviews.text: The best ones! They stay in your ears and cancel all that unnecessary noise around you to keep you in the zone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new yurbuds my old one didn't have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new yurbuds my old one didn't have the mic n volume control and pause vol selection the new one have all that and they have a magnetic feature for the buds so that the don't tangle up easy storage case and just as durable as the ole one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decided to buy another pair cause I really like the sounds in relation to the price and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these in Aug. Left earbud crapped out in March. Decided to buy another pair cause I really like the sounds in relation to the price and also they fit quite well. Second pair is a different size and they're a little too big now and hurt my ears. Not awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Vi K

customer_reviews.title: Best Earphones for Runners!
customer_reviews.text: yurbuds Inspire 400 is my favorite earphones,I previously had Inspire 400 that lasted for 4 year,switched to yurbuds venture pro that were too bulky and couldn't fit my ears and now I am back with the new Inspire 400 with the magnetic clip. I would recommend this product for runners specially as it doesn't fall out and works great during rainy season as well!
customer_reviews.author: Viresh Desai

customer_reviews.title: The new cover design pops out when running. Also ...
customer_reviews.text: The new cover design pops out when running. Also, the wire clip to secure the cords to your shirt are no longer provided. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: The best,  no doubt
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Yurbuds and still love and recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: loki

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and I can attest that they do not come ...
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and I can attest that they do not come lose after a month of circuit training work-outs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bowers

customer_reviews.title: I loved this earphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved this earphones. They really don't fall and the length of them is perfect, the sound is great and also the volume control. I totally recommend it if you are looking for great quality earphone to train weather it is to run or even to do burpees. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Cordoba

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, and design
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound, and design, what Yurbuds are known for. Magnetic earpieces, and great noise cancelling and bass reproduction. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rukgrafx

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were faulty with the side not working and the working side has poor quality The only good thing about the headphones is that the rubber ear piece fits perfectly on the iPhone headphones, so all is not lost and I can at least make some use of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alanlip

customer_reviews.title: great sound, easy access button for volume and pause
customer_reviews.text: A must need for the gym etc.... great sound, easy access button for volume and pause.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: These fit, sound good and work properly. Don't know what more you could ask for
customer_reviews.author: george carrington

customer_reviews.title: great quality sound would buy again
customer_reviews.text: A small gift for my fiancée and he loves them. Stay put in the ear, great quality sound would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Advice
customer_reviews.text: The sound is right, two different colours on left and right will make it easier to two the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: it was great at the beginning but now is just a trash
customer_reviews.text: right ear stopped work after one month, left ear stopped working after 2 month. it was great at the beginning but now is just a trash
customer_reviews.author: yanping wang

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for running as they don't fall out when I run. I have tried many different types and these work great.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have found yurbuds to be durable and comfortable, and these are no exception, but I don't know why these are listed as noise isolating. I bought these for that feature because I work in a busy office, but I found them to be no more noise isolating than other yurbuds I've had in the past. Generally this is a feature rather than a bug, because they allow you to listen at a normal volume while still being aware of your surroundings, but it wasn't what I wanted here. It even says that it allows ambient sound on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Graham

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage, avoid
customer_reviews.text: Covers impossible to put on and/or replace. Total garbage, avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They stay put no matter how you get your cardio in!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hupp

customer_reviews.title: No guarantees....
customer_reviews.text: The right one won't stay in my ear. So much for the guarantee... I will be contacting Yurbuds to return them and try a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Ditka

customer_reviews.title: and is painful to wear after an hour
customer_reviews.text: falls out of your ear whlie running, and is painful to wear after an hour. Does not meet any of the advertised benefits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are unisex but they are very large. Won't fit a woman's ear.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: good, very good
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Very comfortable, they are not fall to exercising, running, weight training, even pulling them hard . Headphones there are not grip in the inside of the ear, there are move, but does not mean they get out of the ear. Very good sound, you hear ambient noise but is not lost quality. They have magnets on helmets. It is very comfortable take them off and together behind your head without falling or remain tangled cables. Negative: The controls Iphone handle the volume is was very low, if you're wearing a jacket have to unbutton his jacket to up volume. Running cables move much, is good idea, one small clip.
customer_reviews.author: NICTE725

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, but it doesn't control the media or phone aspects my Samsung S5. It doesn't claim to, but I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love them! The only issue that I have with ...
customer_reviews.text: Yurbuds are the ONLY headphones that fit and stay in my little ears. I love them! The only issue that I have with them is the fact that the buds fall off so fast. I have already lost one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Doesn't stay in your ear during exercise.
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. "Guaranteed not to fall out". What a joke. I think the message must have been garbled between engineering and marketing, because these are the "Guaranteed to fall out" model. Zing!
customer_reviews.author: MojoJojo

customer_reviews.title: The Yurbud Inspire 400 compares very poor. I'm not sure whether the product was defective
customer_reviews.text: Having used Yurbud Ironman for about 3 years, it appears they are no longer available in the U.K. The Yurbud Inspire 400 compares very poor. I'm not sure whether the product was defective, or the sound was just extremely poor. I have requested for a refund
customer_reviews.author: A. Fowokan

product_meta.title: Yurbuds (CE) Inspire 400 Noise Isolating In-Ear Headphones
product_meta.description: Yurbuds Inspire 400 Noise Isolating In-Ear Headphones (Black) OPEN BOX.Yurbuds Inspire 400 Fitness Headphones (Black)
feature_bullets: Twist Lock Technology keeps your headphones secured with a simple twist; Once in place, the earbuds are 'Locked' into place and won't wrangle even during the most strenuous of exercises
Inspire 400 ear buds are designed with heavy workouts and intensive exercise in mind; Sweat and moisture won't hold you back from your goals, and it should not affect your headphones
Tired of the tangled rats nest that normal headphones find themselves with a gym bag? Quik ClikTM uses tangle magnet to deploy for your workout and store hassle immediately afterwards
The three button inline remote on the Inspire 400 doesn't interrupt your workout or training session when you need to take a call
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
